comments:
On the Host tab of the launch configuration page for External Java Application, 
we can use the 'Remove' button to remove the hosts listed in the 'Default 
hosts' field. When there is only one host left in the list, the 'Remove' is 
still enabled. Click 'Remove' button, the only host can be removed. Close 
the 'Profile' wizard. Then bring up the 'Profile' wizard again, and click on 
any launch configuratio under the External Java Application, an error message 
will show up, and the configuration page can not be loaded.

In the .log file of the Eclipse, there are following error message:
